profile_bio: Ethena provides derivative infrastructure in order to transform Ethereum into the first crypto-native yield bearing synthetic dollar which is not reliant on the banking system: USDe

extracted_posts.post_content: We are excited to share Ethena Labs has raised a $14m seed extension round led by Dragonfly, with participation from Arthur Hayes among many other new investors: Brevan Howard Digital, Franklin Templeton, Galaxy Digital and more.

What a Launch Week forEthena Labs! We've had a huge amount of interest from a world eager to find out about, why the crème de la crème of Web3 are backing us.

Did you know the team is hiring though?https://lnkd.in/enQ4XrHvIf you are truly superb in what you do, explore helping us build and bring forth the answer to the stablecoin trilemma.https://lnkd.in/e8nUr6DQSynthetixDragonflyGSRBitMEXDeribitOKXBybitHuobiGeminiWintermuteBlockTower CapitalNascentFinality Capital PartnersDelphi Digital#futureproof#startup#fintechnews#stablecoin#cryptonews#cryptocurrency#cryptoexchange#cryptocurrencynews#cryptotrading#cryptoinvesting#cryptocurrencytrading#cryptoassets#hiring#jobs#careers#capitalmarkets#fintech#finance#financialservices#defi#crypto#cryptocurrencies#blockchain#ethereum#engineer#solidity#developerjobs#dapps#sales#businessdevelopement#remotejobs#remoteworking#remotejob#quantitativetrading

Ethena is excited to announce our $6.5M seed round led byDragonflywith participation from Arthur Hayes and major derivative exchanges

The round is the first milestone in our mission to develop the first scalable stablecoin not dependent on the banking systemhttps://lnkd.in/e-be7AFx
It’s time to leave the banking system, are you coming with us, anon?

overall_prompt_summary: The document is a security assessment report by Trail of Bits for Paxos. It details the project coverage, findings, and contact information for the team involved. The most critical issues identified include a vulnerability allowing the supply controller to mint and burn tokens during a contract pause, and a risk of front-running the initialization function. Another issue of concern is the potential for the initializeDomainSeparator() function to disrupt ownership transfers. The report suggests that optimizing Solidity compiler settings could mitigate some undefined behaviors and improve contract security.
